ygData.subject: Re: Dual Weild and weapons used - need advice
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually, I ve found the opposite to be true....if you are using a big slow primary weapon and a fast secondary weapon....well it didn t work for me, but maybe
ygData.messageBody:
Actually, I've found the opposite to be true....if you are using a big slow primary weapon and a fast secondary weapon....well it didn't work for me, but maybe it was just my perception, dunno.

>>> "Tom Swift" <tswift@...> 5.22.99 2:23:59 PM >>>
From: "Tom Swift" <tswift@...>


I found using a heavy weapon (mino axe) in my primary slot and a light
weapon (combine scimitar or tentacle whip) in second slot to work out well.
I seem to get more dual attacks this way...not sure if this is factual or
just perception tho


-----Original Message-----
From: suzkim@... <suzkim@...>
To: Warrior Mailing <warriors_eq@onelist.com>
Date: Saturday, May 22, 1999 11:33 AM
Subject: [warriors_eq] Dual Weild and weapons used - need advice


>From: suzkim@...
>
>Greeting,
>
>Finally made it to 15 *does a jig*.
>
>Advice needed.
>
>Have a Mino Axe and a bastard sword. both 8dmg and 32/35.
>
>Keep this combination of weapons?
>If not, which should I switch?
>Does it matter which is in my primary had?
>
>Trying to save most of my monies for some banded armor so maybe some
>advice on what to get now and what to get later?
>
>I noticed that this dual wield takes a lot of stamina. Any magical item
>to help that out? Or is it something I shouldn't worry about?
>
>Thanks,
>
>*hugs*
>
>Azlana
